page.title: 20OTHER FEATURES OF PENDLESIDE
page.content: About 100,000 visitors,of all ages (from children to a man of 95) come each year -from 7different countries in one week!The picnic area with benches & tables and the shop selling refreshments and locally made items as well as Guides,Maps & Brochures (Local & National)also serving as the base for the Countryside Warden & Fell Rescue Service,are the main interests. {BARLEY}has won the County's Best Kept Village Comp. 4times, been runners up 3times & won the "Champion" class in 1984.{NEWCHURCH}have also succeeded. Area Surveyed by Children/Teachers of NewchurchC.E.&Roughlee PrimarySchools &some members of BarleyW.I.Information &help supplied by: Ron Freethy, Keith Houlker, Rennie Martin, Rev.D.Neild, Mr.K.Oldham, W.Pownall,Ginny Robinson, Vera Smith &Tom Swales.{SLIDES:}S.Todd Mrs.E. Johnston, Mrs.D.A.Watkinson
